phrases: So this is where you went.
If you stay in a place like this you will catch a cold.
Maybe someone like you is more suited for me.
Before we go home, let us go to that karaoke place by the train station again.
Every time Otani says or does something,
My whole world has been revolving around Otani, going round and round.
Improve as a Girl With Winning Chocolate!!
So, I have been rejected once already...
And I have not got much confidence left, but...
I was thinking Maybe Koizumi is crying again, or something along those lines.
Maybe someone like you is more suited for me.
Since he said a thing like that,
Go die, why do not you?!
I told you to line up the edges before stapling them, did not I?
Why are you rambling like some old man?
Because you are not doing it properly!
No need to be a stickler.
What are they arguing about now?
I looks like they are organizing the print-outs for the next self study period.
And I lined them all up so neatly too.
Could not you come up with a better analogy?
That is the best I could do.
But it feels like things are great right now.
Koizumi Risa's ranking in the eyes of Otani-kun.
What the heck is that supposed to mean?
As far as Kanzaki-san is concerned, you have won.
From now on, just go for the finish.
It is almost Valentine's Day too.
In the end I did not give him any chocolate last year.
Do not want it again like last year, I will never recover!
Do not say stuff like that.
Is it fine to just let other girls give him chocolate?
He already knows I like him.
I cannot run or hide or anything.
I would actually be giving him honmei chocolate!
What is the point of giving him obligatory chocolate now?
But it will be like confessing to him all over again.
What do you mean you do not want to?
We are in the middle of class.
Did you get any Valentine's chocolate last year?
You know, those girls that come and watch me play basketball all the time.
It was just obligatory chocolate, though.
The moment we had new members, they all flocked to them.
I mean, I will definitely get chocolate from at least one person this year, right?
You are going to give me some, right?
Well, since you asked, I guess I could give you something.
Ah, but you have given me a lot of presents lately.
I guess I will give you something in return next time.
At this rate, I will really get my hopes up.
Could it be he is starting to have feelings for me?
If he is asking me for chocolate, does that mean...
What are you guys up to?
The Home Ec Club going to make chocolate for Valentine's Day.
We are picking up some supplies.
Koizumi-senpai, why do not you make chocolate with us and give it to Otani-senpai?
If we all make something together, it will save money, no?
You are giving chocolate to that midget?
I will give you some too.
It is like you do not care about me at all!
It is okay, is not it?
You will be getting chocolate from your girlfriends anyway, right, Haruka-senpai?
By dating various different types of women, I will grow as a man.
It is all for the sake of one day going out with you, Risa.
Go out with them one at a time!
I do not have much life left in me.
Koizumi-senpai, how are things going with Otani-senpai?
Have not I told you yet?
Like I said, he cannot see me as his girlfriend.
Let us not talk about it.
I do not want to remember.
I will cram him into a vacuum cleaner!
You were rejected, but you are still giving him chocolate?
You do not need to say You were rejected.
Why are you still giving him chocolate?
Seiko-chan, you truly understand this lonely maiden's heart.
We do not need to understand that kind of maiden's heart.
Forget all about that idiot who rejected you!
I think he will fall for me eventually.
Besides, it feels like things are going well at the moment.
I will be cheering for you!
It does not matter if it takes time.
I do not need to rush.
Just slowly, slowly become captivated by me.
Gross. what is got you in such a good mood?
A new album will be out in Spring.
We have got to get it!
He will be doing another concert too.
Who else would I go to an Umibouzu concert with?
We need to book tickets soon.
What the hell was that, you...?!
I did not ask about that!
Hey, hey, what is going on?
What the hell do you want?
The comedy duo is breaking up?
Tell me exactly what you think is wrong with Risa?!
Well, I mean... that is... how should I put it...?
Why do I have to explain myself to you?!
Since you had the nerve to do that, stay away from Risa, from now on!
Stop toying with her maiden heart, you playboy!
Do not you think you are being cruel?!
It is not like that, you idiot!
And you seemed to get along so well.
Do not do pointless stuff like this.
But that guy is so cruel!
He rejected you, but he is still going around smiling like nothing happened!
There is a limit to how dense a person can be!
I told him to do that.
I told him to not worry about it and just act the way he did before.
I said it is fine, so it is fine!
Stop interfering or I will bite your head off!
I was just worried about you.
I will work hard on my own.
So just leave me alone, okay?
How could you reject such a nice girl?
Uh, do not worry about what Haruka did just now.
We are all on your side!
Do not worry, everyone is cheering for you.
I do not know exactly what is going on, but I will do my best.
Am I really a playboy who is toying with a maiden's heart?
So how do you feel about Koizumi-san?
Well, if you are asking me whether I like or dislike her, I would say I like her, but...
Do you want her to be your girlfriend?
That is the problem, is not it?
I mean, suppose she was my girlfriend...
Then we would have to kiss...
Do not you think that is kind of comical?
You are laughing, are not you?!
I am breaking out in a cold sweat.
And here I thought it would only be a matter of time before you guys would go out.
Because when you talk to her, you seem like you are interested.
Like after that incident with Kanzaki-san.
I heard about it from Nobu-chan.
I was thinking Maybe Koizumi is crying again, or something along those lines.
Maybe someone like you is more suited for me.
I was just saying what was on my mind without really thinking about it.
And did not you ask her for Valentine's chocolate?
I just want to eat chocolate.
There is no meaning behind it.
A casual comment from you makes Koizumi-san more flustered than you can imagine.
D-Do not make it sound so scary.
Do you think we made too much?
It is fine, it is fine.
I wonder if darling is finished with his club activities.
It might be a day early, but I am going to give these to him.
Risa, do you want to bring yours over too?
I have prepared the wrapping and everything.
Are you really giving that to him?
But you said you were going to give me some...
She is really going to give that midget chocolate?
I am going to go to the washroom for a bit.
Thanks to Haruka, I am even more determined now.
I will not run or hide any more.
This... is not obligatory chocolate, is it?
Um... could not you just make it obligatory chocolate?
You will not accept it if it is honmei chocolate?
You are the one who wanted it!
So in other words, you cannot accept my feelings?
Otani, the teacher's calling for you.
Sorry, I will be right there.
Darling said some pointless things to Otani-kun.
If you are not interested, do not be so nice to me.
I cannot say something cool like that.
Still... even if he is not interested, I will be happy if he is still nice to me.
And I will try even harder!
I cannot accept honmei chocolate when my own feelings are still uncertain.
Are you trying to be a tough guy?
I never thought you were so dense, or a playboy.
You have not done anything wrong, Otani.
If anyone is in the wrong it is me, for refusing to give up.
So I do not care if you like or hate me.
Just say whatever is on your mind.
Anyway, just take it for now.
Sorry that it is honmei chocolate.
It is fine if it takes time.
As long as he gradually starts to like me.
But the girl who is fallen for me is a real idiot, huh?
What is that supposed to mean?!
You are the one who told me to say whatever I think.
Hey, are you trying to piss me off?
Does St. Valentine just hate me?
Koizumi, what are you doing at my house?
All alone with Otani-kun in his room huh?
But I am not the least bit tempted to do anything.
A First Kiss in His Room?
A First Kiss in His Room?
